The subclause on “Continual improvement” (5.6) illustrates how the PDCA approach can be effectively applied to top management’s strategic planning and review process in order to realize and further improve financial and economic benefits. Subclause 5.6 is embedded within the Act column of all other subclauses in Clause 5. The output from implementing the overall process is financial and economic benefits. The achievable benefits are examples and are not intended to be all inclusive.
